Deities @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Dammerich]{Dammerich}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Erecura]{Erecura}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Followers of Fate]{Followers of Fate}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Geryon]{Geryon}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Gruhastha]{Gruhastha}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Iomedae]{Iomedae}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Irori]{Irori}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Kols]{Kols}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Kurgess]{Kurgess}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ma'at]{Ma'at}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Magdh]{Magdh}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Mahathallah]{Mahathallah}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Monad]{Monad}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Pillars of Knowledge]{Pillars of Knowledge}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Ravithra]{Ravithra}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Sarenrae]{Sarenrae}, @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.deities.Zohls]{Zohls}

Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Word of Truth]{Word of Truth}; Advanced Domain Spell @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Glimpse the Truth]{Glimpse the Truth}

You pierce lies and discover the truth.
name: Truth Domain
